document.heading: District of Columbia Water and Sewer Operations Amendment Act of 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-136, the “District of Columbia Water and Sewer Operations Amendment Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-269, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 27, 1990, and April 10, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 17, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-192 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
